name: Landfall
description:
When your ship mysteriously crashes during a routine scanning operation you find yourself stranded on an alien world. Armed with your rifle and a scanner you must traverse the alien landscape, scan the local lifeforms, defeat hostile creatures and find a way to get home. 

Landfall is intended to be an exploration focused experience, designed for players who enjoy hunting through environments to uncover the story. The main experience should last about 20-30 minutes but exploring the locations fully, uncovering secrets and filling your scan log will take some deeper exploration. 

  • Scan the local lifeforms, relics and monuments to create a logbook of the planet
  • Solve puzzles and uncover the mystery of the seemingly abandoned world
  • Traverse 3 unique biomes and discover the inhabitants exclusive to them
  • Revisit areas to find hidden life forms and lore
  • Locate hidden passages and explore the ruins hidden throughout the world
